Verses: 1 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Velaiseygira Aarunaalilum Kizhakkukku Edhiraana Utpraagaaraththinudaiya Vaasal Poottappattirundhu, Oivunaalilum Maadhappirappilum Thirakkappadakkadavadhu.

2 appozhudhu Adhipadhi Velivaasal Mandabaththin Vazhiyaai Pravesiththu, Vaasal Nilaiyandaiyile Nirkakkadavan; Aasaariyargalo Avanudaiya Thaganapaliyaiyum, Avanudaiya Samaadhaana Paligalaiyum Padaikkakkadavargal; Avan Vaasarpadiyile Aaraadhanai Seydhu, Pinbu Purappaduvaanaaga; Andha Vaasal Saayankaalamattum Poottappadaadhiruppadhaaga.
3 dhesaththu Janangalum Oivunaatkalilum Maadhappirappugalilum Andha Vaasalin Nadaiyile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Aaraadhanai Seyyakkadavargal.
4 adhipadhi Oivunaalile Karththarukkup Paliyidum Thaganapali, Pazhudhatra Aaru Aattukkuttigalum Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkadaavume.

5 aattukkadaavode Pojanapaliyaaga Oru Marakkaal Maavaiyum, Aattukkuttigalode Pojanapaliyaagath Than Thiraanikkuththakkadhaaith Tharugira Eevaiyum, Ovvoru Marakkaal Maavode Orupadi Enneyaiyum Padaikkakkadavan.
6 maadhappirappaana Naalilo, Avan Pazhudhatra Oru Ilankaalaiyaiyum, Pazhudhatra Aaru Aattukkuttigalaiyudaiya Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum Paliyittu,

7 pojanapaliyaaga Ilankaalaiyode Oru Marakkaal Maavaiyum, Aattukkadaavode Oru Marakkaal Maavaiyum, Aattukkuttigalode Than Thiraanikkuththakkadhaai, Ovvoru Marakkaal Maavode Orupadi Enneyaiyum Padaikkakkadavan.
8 adhipadhi Varugirapodhu Vaasalmandabaththin Vazhiyaaip Pravesiththu, Adhu Vazhiyaaith Thirumbap Purappadakkadavan.

9 dhesaththin Janangal Kurikkappatta Naatkalil Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Varumpodhu, Aaraadhanai Seygiradharkaaga Vadakku Vaasalvazhiyaai Utpravesiththavan Therku Vaasalvazhiyaaip Purappadavum, Therkuvaasalvazhiyaai Utpravesiththavan Vadakkuvaasal Vazhiyaaip Purappadavumkadavan; Thaan Pravesiththa Vaasal Vazhiyaaith Thirumbippogaamal, Thanakku Edhiraana Vazhiyaaip Purappattuppovaanaaga.
10 avargal Utpravesikkumpodhu, Adhipadhi Avargal Naduvile Avargalodekooda Utpravesiththu, Avargal Purappadumpodhu Avanumkoodap Purappaduvaanaaga.

11 pandigaigalilum Kurikkappatta Kaalangalilum Avan Padaikkum Pojanapaliyaavadhu: Kaalaiyode Oru Marakkaal Maavum, Aattukkadaavode Oru Marakkaal Maavum, Aattukkuttigalode Avan Thiraanikkuththakkadhaaith Tharugira Oru Eevum, Ovvoru Marakkaal Maavode Orupadi Enneyum Kodukkavendum.

12 adhipadhi Urchaagamaana Thaganapaliyaagilum, Samaadhaana Paligalaiyaagilum Karththarukku Urchaagamaai Seluththavendumendraal, Avanukkuk Kizhakku Nokkiya Edhiraana Vaasal Thirakkappaduvadhaaga; Appozhu
